Main Catalog Page

DESCRIPTION

  • Preloaded with up to 5 Products, 1 Category and 1 Payment Gateway. You can add or remove as many as you like yourself.
  • Up to 4 information pages.
  • ECOMM WordPress (Woocommerce) website design. (21-day time-line & 8 Development hours)
  • Add to cart, check out and pay.
  • Payment gateway integration. Eg. PayFast, PayPal, Amazon Pay and many more.
  • Shipping module ready. Eg. Aramex, Collivery.net, Courier Guy and many more.
  • Platform allows unlimited products. (First 5, 30 or 100 included within product fee as stated)
  • WordPress 3rd party template based.
  • Fully responsive from Desktop to Smartphone.
  • Micro Business hosting package (coza domain, emails and hosting) included for one year at no price difference.
    View package here
  • Once the order is placed we will be in contact within 4 working hours via email to assist further.

 [/et_pb_text][et_pb_code disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Domain Availability Checker” _builder_version=”4.11.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”] Domain Availability Checker[/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Important Notes” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#111111″ link_font=”||||on||||dotted” link_text_color=”#333333″ header_3_font=”|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#111111″ header_3_font_size=”14px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”20px|20px||20px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IMPORTANT NOTES

  • These are the product Terms & Conditions.
  • Refund & Return Policy.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_description disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Short Description” _builder_version=”4.11.2″ body_text_color=”#111111″ link_font=”||||on||||dotted” link_text_color=”#333333″
